title: Sip Or Spill: Moe Can't Handle These Tough Questions!
description:
Last week during Sip or Spill, Tommy was roasted for bringing in a drink he hates, only for Kristin to enjoy being put in the hot seat to drink every single sip!
This week it’s Moe's turn, and he's not getting off easy with these questions. Plus, what he has to drink is absolutely DISGUSTING!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
